        //Entry newEntry

public boolean remove(Object o) {  
        if (o==null) {  
            for (Entry<E> e = header.next; e != header; e = e.next) {  
                if (e.element==null) {  
                    remove(e);  
                    return true;  
                }  
            }  
        } else {  
            for (Entry<E> e = header.next; e != header; e = e.next) {  
                if (o.equals(e.element)) {  
                    remove(e);  
                    return true;  
                }  
            }  
        }  
        return false;  
    }

private E remove(Entry<E> e) {  
        if (e == header)

        //next  
        e.previous.next = e.next;  
        //previous  
        //  
        e.next.previous = e.previous;  
        //  
        e.next = e.previous = null;  
        e.element = null;  
        size--;  
        modCount++;  
        return result;  
    }

    public class Person {  
    private int age;  
    private int sex;    //01  
    private String name;  

    private final int PRIME = 37;  

    Person(int age ,int sex ,String name){  
        this.age = age;  
        this.sex = sex;  
        this.name = name;  
    }  

    /** gettersetter **/  

    @Override  
    public int hashCode() {  
        System.out.println("hashCode...........");  

        int hashResult = 1;  
        hashResult = (hashResult + Integer.valueOf(age).hashCode() + Integer.valueOf(sex).hashCode()) * PRIME;  
        hashResult = PRIME * hashResult + ((name == null) ? 0 : name.hashCode());   
        System.out.println("name:"+name +" hashCode:" + hashResult);  

        return hashResult;  
    }  

    /** 
    * hashCode() 
    */  
    public boolean equals(Object obj) {  
        System.out.println("equals...........");  

        if(obj == null){  
            return false;  
        }  
        if(obj.getClass() != this.getClass()){  
            return false;  
        }  
        if(this == obj){  
            return true;  
        }  

        Person person = (Person) obj;  

        if(getAge() != person.getAge() || getSex()!= person.getSex()){  
            return false;  
        }  

        if(getName() != null){

    public class Person {  
    private int age;  
    private int sex;    //01  
    private String name;  

    private final int PRIME = 37;  

    Person(int age ,int sex ,String name){  
        this.age = age;  
        this.sex = sex;  
        this.name = name;  
    }  

    /** gettersetter **/  

    @Override  
    public int hashCode() {  
        System.out.println("hashCode...........");  

        int hashResult = 1;  
        hashResult = (hashResult + Integer.valueOf(age).hashCode() + Integer.valueOf(sex).hashCode()) * PRIME;  
        hashResult = PRIME * hashResult + ((name == null) ? 0 : name.hashCode());   
        System.out.println("name:"+name +" hashCode:" + hashResult);  

        return hashResult;  
    }  

    /** 
    * hashCode() 
    */  
    public boolean equals(Object obj) {  
        System.out.println("equals...........");  

        if(obj == null){  
            return false;  
        }  
        if(obj.getClass() != this.getClass()){  
            return false;  
        }  
        if(this == obj){  
            return true;  
        }  

        Person person = (Person) obj;  

        if(getAge() != person.getAge() || getSex()!= person.getSex()){  
            return false;  
        }  

        if(getName() != null){  
            if(!getName().equals(person.getName())){  
                return false;  
            }  
        }  
        else if(person != null){  
            return false;  
        }  
        return true;  
    }  
}
